category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Enter here the chat rooms (channel) without(!) prepend '#' wich are opened automatically by entering the chat. Seperate more than one channel by a comma.

Enter here a pattern for guest nicks. The pattern must contain one or more '.' anywhere, wich are automatically replaced with random letters or numbers by QWebIRC to avoid duplicated nicks.
If the field is empty, guest nicks will be created by the following pattern: "qwebirc_...."
Enter here the height of chat in pixels.

Enter here a prefix wich is prepend before the nick of registered users.
REMARK: Use only charcters wich are allowed inside IRC. A single _ at the beginning is also not allowed.
Enter here the URL to the Quakenet Web-IRC-Server. Normally, you don't have to edit this entry!

Enter here the ID of your personal settings for QWebIRC to set the appearance to your needs.
To get a Settings-ID go to http://webchat.quakenet.org and select inside menu "Add webchat to your site".
Use the content of a profile field as prefix.

Enter here an ID of a user profile field wich content is used as prefix for the nick.
REMARK: In this case the content of the field will be automatically covered into '[]' (e.g. for clan short names and other).
Use the content of a profile field as nick.
Enter here an ID of a user profile field wich content is used as nick instead of user name if the user is logged in.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Members of this user group can use the Quakenet Web-IRC client.
